title: General Sample Description - stages defined here apply to all description instances
description: Definitions for elements that appear in different stages of a wizard targeted: 'ref', id of stage; 'title',  header used for the stage; items, actual form elements on the page; 'is_singular_stage', if all items must have same value for this stage

properties.title: Number of Samples
properties.message: How many samples do you want to describe? You can describe multiple samples having a common set of attributes.

properties.title: Sample Clone
properties.message: Do you want to clone an existing sample? Cloning an existing sample can speed up the description process.

items.help_tip: Select 'Yes' if you intend to clone an existing sample
items.label: Clone a Sample?

option_values.label: Yes
option_values.description: Select this option if you wish to clone an existing sample. You will, at a later stage, be able to select a sample to clone.

option_values.label: No
option_values.description: Select this option if you do not wish to clone a sample.

properties.title: Sample Type
properties.message: How do want to describe your samples? Sample Type provides suitable metadata specifications for your description.

properties.title: Clone Target
properties.message: You may now select a sample to clone

properties.title: Sample Bundle
properties.message:
Please provide information that can be used to label your samples. If you already have sample names entered elsewhere, you can enter or paste them as tab or comma delimited string values in the Provided Names box. Alternatively, you can supply a ‘bundle name’, in the Bundle Name box, that will form the base part from which individual sample names may be derived. Please note the following:
  1. Provided Names, if supplied, takes precedence over Bundle Name
  2. Sample names, both generated and provided, will be validated in the next stage for uniqueness

items.help_tip: A bundle name is the base part from which individual sample names may be derived.
items.label: Bundle Name

properties.title: Sample Name
properties.message: Do you want to modify the generated sample names to better reflect individual samples in your bundle?
